lead_paragraph: Jan 24 (Reuters) – - Napoli coach Maurizio Sarri wants to move on from his touchline dispute with Inter Milan's Roberto Mancini and return to winning ways against Sampdoria in Serie A on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Sarri Wants Napoli Focus on Samp Not Mancini
headline.main: Sarri Wants Napoli Focus on Samp Not Mancini
